raw_comment:
The first thing I noticed was that people 15-24 years old believe that the world is getting better significantly more than 40+ year olds. I also immediately noticed that Indonesia is by far the most optimistic country.


How come the age groups have such a different opinion? Also, why are people in Indonesia so optimistic? 

I feel like my community is pretty happy, and I personally haven't noticed any people saying that the world is getting worse every generation. 

For a catchy headline I’d probably say: “Is the world getting worse?”
